name: Bills
description: Expenses related to utilities, rent/mortgage, insurance, etc.

name: Food
description: Expenses related to groceries, restaurants, and dining out.

name: Transportation
description: Expenses related to gas, public transportation, and car maintenance.

name: Entertainment
description: Expenses related to movies, concerts, books, and other leisure activities.

name: Shopping
description: Expenses related to clothing, accessories, and other personal items.

name: Health
description: Expenses related to medical bills, prescriptions, and health-related items.

name: Travel
description: Expenses related to flights, hotels, and vacation activities.

name: Gifts
description: Expenses related to giving gifts to others.

name: Salary
description: Money you receive from a job, investments, or other sources.

name: Miscellaneous
description: Any other expenses that don't fit into the above categories.
